name: MondoCastroMinute
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Mondo squeezes more than 20 years of experience in media, broadcasting, corporate, consultancy, and training in his Briefs. He is a speaker, coach, and trainer who works for huge companies as well as start-ups! He is a member of The John Maxwell Team, a Gallup International Strengths Coach, a Dale Carnegie Trainer, a Genos International Emotional Intelligence Practitioner, and an International Society of Neuro-Semantics Meta- NLP Practitioner. He also has an MBA from both the Ateneo De Manila University and the Regis University in Colorado. Mondo is currently slaving away to acquire a PhD in Leadership Studies, major in Business Leadership. To make himself likeable, he wants you to know that he was a TV and movie actor in the Philippines, a TV host, a radio DJ, a musician, and a dork.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
